Board.name: traffic
Board.author: Bruno Coudoin (bruno.coudoin@gcompris.net)
Board.title: A sliding-block puzzle game
Board.description: Remove the red car from the parking lot through the gate on the right
Board.goal: Remove the red car from the parking lot through the gate on the right
Board.manual: Each car can only move either horizontally or vertically. You must make some room in order to let the red car move through the gate on the right.
